column4: hi short question. if i do the Natty beta update via "update-manager -d" can i do the same again for the stable in 2 weeks?
The short and quick is yes, but backup all data and whatnot, basically the /home dir, see http://www.ubuntu.com/testing/natty/alpha2
thanks...highly experimental machine no important stuff
Okeed okee, make a backup or use one for the rest of us as it is still in testing, Thank you.
